title: Venison with sweet and sour parsnips, pear and curly kale
description: The is essentially a simple dish that showcases the wonderful flavour of venison. A  few special additions such as sweet and sour parsnips and pear ribbons transform it into an impressive meal.
ingredients: 1 medium parsnip, peeled, sliced into ribbons on a mandoline
200g/7oz kale, washed thoroughly, tough stalks removed
1 Conference pear, peeled, core removed, sliced into ribbons lengthways on a mandoline
200ml/7fl oz red wine gravy, heated to boiling point
